Title: Requires the New York state energy research and development authority conduct a study on the feasibility, storing and transferring of hydrogen energy to residential and commercial structures
Summary: Requires the New York state energy research and development authority conduct a study on the feasibility, storing and transferring of hydrogen energy to residential and commercial structures in cities and towns with a population greater than twenty thousand.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the New York state energy research and development authority study the feasibility of creating, storing and transferring hydrogen energy to residential and commercial structures
